data.title: Spring Grove Area School District
data.meta_description: Spring Grove Area School District challenges and motivates all students to attain their full potential. Learn more!
data.text:
HS-BrianCampbellCoachoftheYear2024.png

2024AthletesoftheYear.jpg

Congratulations, SGAHS Class of 2024!

SGI-DiscGolf-2.jpg

Winner of the 2024 "Most Innovative Workplace Wellness Program" Award

The Workplace Wellness Awards program from the Central Penn Business Group on Health recognizes businesses and organizations that have demonstrated outstanding commitment to improving the health and well-being of their employees.

We are absolutely thrilled to win this prestigious award and deeply grateful to our outstanding Rocket Wellness Committee members, composed of dedicated staff who organize and spearhead a multitude of wellness programs, activities, and initiatives for our colleagues. This accolade highlights our commitment to fostering a thriving workplace culture.

Best Communities for Music Education - 12 Years in a Row!

The NAMM Foundation has named Spring Grove Area School District one of the Best Communities for Music Education for the twelfth consecutive year. The designation is a testament to the District's outstanding commitment to music education, which is made possible by our dedicated music teachers, students, supportive staff, Music Boosters, and our Rocket community.

U.S. News Best High School

Spring Grove Area High School received the 2023-2024 U.S. News Best High School Award. SGAHS proudly ranks in the top 21% in the state and the top 25% in the nation.

2024 Niche Best School

Spring Grove Area School District was awarded the 2024 Niche Best Schools designation. Niche offers K-12 school rankings by state based on stats, test scores, and school ratings.

Rocket Wellness Center for Staff

Spring Grove Area School District staff and substitutes have access to a dedicated health center in the district with 24/7 access to a primary care provider. The Rocket Wellness Center represents a tremendous opportunity to improve the general health of our community through easier access to care that will be free or low cost for the employee and spend fewer taxpayer dollars, thus giving us more money to dedicate to student education.

Learn More
